segments.text: Everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman in dress and apron, focused on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to a pretty garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€” water's running over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Pouring down the cabinets in sheets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children: boy's on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR
